comment.author: 63493070@N02
comment._content: Obvious is George's association with Fox as an aerial cameraman. Tragically he died within a few years of this photo. He was taught to fly by Burdett Fuller and soloed in just 6 hours. Died after trying to make a forced landing at Westchester Bluffs (Playa Del Rey) sand dunes, now LAX boundary. His flying companion was Fox associate Otis C. Freeman.
